definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.chinese: 該地圖集還強調了其它方面的不平衡狀況。

sentences.english: It marked one of the earliest photographic series ever published.
sentences.chinese: 它是攝影有史以來最早出版的圖集之一。

sentences.english: Recently, My Shiqian, kind of prose atlas, has been published.
sentences.chinese: 最近，還出版了一本名叫《我的石阡》的散文圖集。

sentences.english: Division design is one of the principal problems in electronic atlas design.
sentences.chinese: 分幅地圖是電子地圖集設計中的一個主要問題。

sentences.english: Below those categories are some additional links to photos of the Death Valley region and the San Andreas fault zone.
sentences.chinese: 圖集下面是附加的死亡谷和聖安地列斯斷層帶連接。

sentences.english: The architect determines the set of views that adequately represent the required dimensions of the software architecture.
sentences.chinese: 架構師將確定足以表示所需軟件架構範疇的視圖集。

sentences.english: Atlas of ancient architecture pavilion construction.
If you use the atlases on microfilm, copies are easily made.
sentences.chinese: 如果利用微縮膠片地圖集，那麼很容易製作拷貝品。

sentences.english: This atlas describes the anatomical basics of dendrochronology and wood technology.
sentences.chinese: 這本地圖集描述樹木年代學和木頭技術的解剖的基礎。

sentences.english: According to the "Atlas of the Chinese language", the Qixian dialect belongs to Bingzhou part of Jin dialect.
sentences.chinese: 在《中國語言地圖集》中，祁縣方言屬晉語幷州片。

sentences.english: This page provides lots of information about project and data, including a selection of animated maps.
sentences.chinese: 此站點提供計劃與數據的大量信息，包括動態地圖集。

sentences.english: A photo album spans his 20-year political career.
sentences.chinese: 下面的圖集回顧了他20年來的從政生涯。

definition: to obscure the facts (idiom); to mislead the public with prevarication and deliberate falsehoods
(Tw) (publishing) belly band (paper sash around a book, outside the dust jacket)
